actions.recommendation: Optimising your vitamin D level is important. This is not only important for bone health but for over a 100 different processes in your body. Vitamin D functions like a hormone and is important for general wellbeing, cognitive function, preventing certain cancers and reducing inflammation. Supplement with D3 5000iu and recheck in 6 months.

No family history available as Mike is adopted. Mildly raised cholesterol. Currently not doing any exercise and due to travelling and work stress the diet needs some attention. Alcohol consumption increasing above recommended intake.

Optimising your vitamin D level is important. This is not only important for bone health but for over a 100 different processes in your body. Vitamin D functions like a hormone and is important for general wellbeing, cognitive function, preventing certain cancers and reducing inflammation. Supplement with D3 5000iu and recheck in 6 months.

Due to your stress and frequent travel, your diet has not been great and you have gained approximately 5kg.Try to follow a Mediterranean style diet rich in colourful vegetables, healthy fats such as olives, avocado, olive oil, nuts and seeds, good quality protein and fatty fish. Limit refined carbs such as bread, pasta, rice, pastries and sugar.

High homocysteine levels can increase risk for heart disease and usually indicate a need for activated B vitamins. Supplement with Phytomulti multivitamin. Aiming for a homocysteine level of around 8.
